attributes.action: no more taxes enough is enough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: tax increases and new taxes seem to be the flavour of the month each and every month. we pay taxes for just about everything we do in life including death. if governments stopped wasting our money on things such as iraq and afganistan to mention just two there would be plenty to go around for BRITISH citizens. the natural increase in prices already gives the government a healthy increase in taxes year on year, so why the need to keep increasing or introducing new taxes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
